publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2504 Gil Paterson: The Fire and Rescue Service—That the Parliament notes the important service that the fire and rescue serviceprovides in our communities and thanks all those who dedicate themselves to delivering it; believes that the quicker fire crews respond to incidents the better chance they have of rescuing those who seek assistance, and supports the campaign to reintroduce incident response standards. Supported by: Aileen Campbell*, Alasdair Allan*, Kenneth Gibson*, Rob Gibson*, Jamie Hepburn*, Bill Kidd*, Bob Doris*, Bashir Ahmad*, Mike Pringle*, Sandra White*, Bill Wilson*, Christine Grahame*, Cathy Peattie*
S3M-2504 The Fire and Rescue Service (lodged on 8 September 2008) Christina McKelvie*
S3M-2504 The Fire and Rescue Service (lodged on 8 September 2008) Stuart McMillan*, Joe FitzPatrick*

S3M-2504 Gil Paterson: The Fire and Rescue Service—That the Parliament notes the important service that the fire and rescue service provides in our communities and thanks all those who dedicate themselves to delivering it; believes that the quicker fire crews respond to incidents the better chance they have of rescuing those who seek assistance, and supports the campaign to reintroduce incident response standards. Supported by: Aileen Campbell, Alasdair Allan, Kenneth Gibson, Rob Gibson, Jamie Hepburn, Bill Kidd, Bob Doris, Bashir Ahmad, Mike Pringle, Sandra White, Bill Wilson, Christine Grahame, Cathy Peattie, Christina McKelvie, Stuart McMillan, Joe FitzPatrick
S3M-2504 The Fire and Rescue Service (lodged on 8 September 2008) Angela Constance*
